ref module:¶

holtz.apogee.ref.get_ref(all)[source]¶

Given allStar structure, match by ID to reference catalog Args :

all : allStar structure
Returns:list of indices in cal that have Kepler matches ref : Kepler structure refindex : list of indices in kep that have APOGEE matches
Return type:calindex
